title: Is that PBE Smite buff smart?

embed.description: This is a WORK IN PROGRESS POST - Today' s Patch out but the PBE still down ] The PBE has been updated! Continue reading for more information! ( Warning: PBE Content is tentative and iterative - what you see may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers!

body:
Smite
Now lists that it can hold two charges and regains a charge every 60 seconds. 

I really don't like it. If there is  2-3 seconds between Smite casts, then I guess it'd be alright.
